commits.message:
Merge pull request #174 from eucalyptus/GUI-195

GUI-195: Enable "No preference" availability zone option for Eucalyptus and AWS
GUI-195: Remove reference to windows icon for windows images in launch instance (and launch config) wizards.
Merge branch 'develop' into GUI-195.  Refactored initialization of Instance and Volume form choices.  Resolved conflicts in forms.instances and forms.volumes.
Refactor how we initialize form choices, allowing common choices to be reused across the app.  Leverage refactored choices for the Launch Instance and Edit Instance forms.  GUI-195

Merge branch 'develop' into GUI-195

Conflicts:
	koala/templates/master_layout.pt
More progress on block device mapping editor on Launch Instance page.  GUI-195

Fix overflow issue on Images landing page (tile view).  Set image name rather than ID as the tile header.  Added a launch instance button to the image detail page.  Better handling of names input on Launch Instance page.  GUI-195
Add ‘Next step’ button to proceed to next wizard step, triggering validation feedback if there are any errors.  GUI-195
GUI-195: Selectively display summary in launch instance wizard
GUI-195: Display rules for selected security group in step 3 of Launch Instance wizard
Allow the size of the root device to be modified in the block device mapping editor of the Launch Instance wizard.  GUI-195
Initial progress incorporating platform icons in Image Picker widget for Launch Instance wizard.  GUI-195
Move Images JSON view to a distinct class to more easily reuse it elsewhere.  GUI-195
Try a safer approach for attaching names to multiple instances in one batch.  GUI-195
Convert vertical tabs to horizontal tabs on Launch Instance wizard.  Remove step labels and only display numbers for small-screen view.  GUI-195
Port the image.platform lookup from 3.4, refactored a bit for good measure.  GUI-195
Better handling of validation errors when attempting to proceed to next step in launch instance wizard.  Add ‘Use default from image’ choice to kernel/ramdisk id field.  GUI-195
GUI-195: Enable "No preference" availability zone option for Eucalyptus *and* AWS
GUI-195:  Only pull machine images for image picker in wizards and on Images landing page.
Pass snapshot choices to block device mapping editor for Launch Instance wizard.  GUI-195
Add search filter text input for image picker widget on Launch Instance wizard.  GUI-195
Get Image Picker widget to display images based on default filter in Launch Instance wizard.  GUI-195
Restrict max number of instances that can be launched in one shot to 10 rather than 99 (for now).  GUI-195
Make names required in Launch Instance wizard.  GUI-195
Allow input of Image ID on Launch Instance page if the image isn’t specified, allowing an instance to be launched from any image ID.  Particularly useful for the AWS version of the console.  GUI-195
Pass the image_id in the form to avoid losing a reference to the image.  Better handling of instance names when it isn’t a comma-separated list.  GUI-195
Initial progress on Launch Instance page.  GUI-195

Merge pull request #169 from eucalyptus/GUI-195

GUI-195: Launch Instance Wizard Redux
GUI-195: Misc fixes for Details step in Launch Instance wizard.

Merge pull request #57 from eucalyptus/GUI-195

GUI-195: Launch Instance
Pull in owner_alias choices into image picker widget, also refactored for the Images landing page for reuse.  GUI-195
Pass user_data to launch instances handler.  GUI-195
Show instance name or id instead of “id (name)” on instance detail page.  GUI-195
Pre-fill Launch Instance form fields with reasonable defaults.  Initial progress on block device mapping editor.  GUI-195
Merge branch 'develop' into GUI-195
More style tweaks for multi-step wizard.  GUI-195
GUI-195: Add "No preference" option to availability zone choices (Euca only) in Launch Instance wizard.
GUI-195: Better label and button text for Enter image id on step 1 of launch instance wizard.

Merge branch 'develop' into GUI-195

Conflicts:
	koala/templates/images/image_view.pt
	koala/templates/images/images.pt
	koala/views/images.py
Move tag editor and security group rule editor JS files to a new /static/js/widgets folder, since they aren’t scoped to just one page.  Laying groundwork for new image picker widget for GUI-195
Display tags on instances landing page (table view).  Don’t display tags that start with “aws:” on landing pages.  GUI-195
Set more default field values to reduce the number of steps required to launch an instance.  GUI-195
Set “owned by Amazon” as default filter for Images landing page.   GUI-195

Better server-side validators for Launch Instance form.  Auto-add Zurb Foundation Abide pattern=‘integer’ to any field that’s an instance of WTForms IntegerField.  Initial progress on Summary (preview) area of Launch Instance.  GUI-195
GUI-195: Left-align checkboxes in launch instance wizard's advanced step.
GUI-195: Mods for block device mapping editor in Launch Instance wizard, based on UX feedback.
GUI-195: Display all tabs in Launch Instance wizard even if no image is selected.
Fix platform lookup from image description and add image.name to the platform sniffer.  Use a cleaner icon for generic Linux platform.  GUI-195
Display scroll bar for image picker.  GUI-195
Allow adding/removing devices in block device mapping editor on Launch Instance page.  GUI-195
Gracefully handle 403 responses for items that are cached for long-term durations (e.g. Images per region).  GUI-195
Cache images per region rather than per connection.  Minor style fixes for images landing page.  Better word-wrap behavior for all landing pages (tile view).  GUI-195
Experiment with Foundation vertical tabs for steps in Launch Instance wizard.  Initial progress on common wizard styles.  GUI-195

Merge pull request #130 from eucalyptus/GUI-195

GUI-195: Updates for Launch Instance Wizard
GUI-195: Update summary area to match wireframe.

Add kernel/ramdisk of selected image to kernel/ramdisk choices since they’re often missing from the get_all_kernels() and get_all_ramdisks() fetches.  Instance names aren’t required in Launch Instance wizard.  GUI-195
Enable owner_alias filter for image picker widget for Launch Instance wizard.  GUI-195
Merge branch 'develop' into GUI-195
Use the proper method of launching multiple instances.  GUI-195
Add help icon to Images landing page.  Add help modal and link to instance launch page from modal if the user prefers to enter a known image ID to launch an instance from.  GUI-195
Link Launch Instance buttons where appropriate.  GUI-195
More progress on Launch Instance page.  Build form field options and display form on page.  GUI-195
